TopicTitle: How to fix Raster Prop Monitor

Articles.Content:
Hi, I have Raster Prop Monitor and all i see on the screen of RPM is DARKNESS.

I did all that i am suposed to do: I put the Jsi Folder into the Gamedata floder, I even tried putting the contents of the JSI folder into the gamedata folder.And there is an errror message saying inittialization failed please look at the manuel again.

I did an =d nothing has changed

HELP ME

Did you install module manager? Incompatible versions? I forgot if RPM has any dependencies, but if it does, did you install them?

Screenshots please.

I did install module manager and so sorry but i cant  take a screenshot just imagine a RPM monior with nothing in it.

So can anybody fix this?

Huh. What other mods do you run? Are the versions compatible? I use aset and relevant stuff, and you need to install other mods to get stuff done. 

I think RPM is a mod for other modders to build on.

Have you tried pressing buttons next to the RPM? Not every button works, just be a kerbal and SMASH ALL OF THEM. Ahem. Sorry Im hyper.

On 8/11/2018 at 11:03 AM, LIPLOOP said:

I did install module manager and so sorry but i cant  take a screenshot just imagine a RPM monior with nothing in it.

So can anybody fix this?

 

Moderators please move this thread to somewhere appropriate.

Yes i did have Compatible ods yet again nothing works

I tried buttons NOTHING
You need to post a log file the mods work so you are doing something wrong or you have something missing in short a log file is need to get help
